effects.title: Interruptible
effects.text: If you take an enemy hit, Beam of Power will be interrupted.

last-resprt.name: Last Resort
last-resprt.description: Doing incredible damage, you give up 1/5th of your total health to give out your sacrifice.

effects.title: Recharge
effects.text: Each enemy you hit reduces cooldowns for all your spells except Last Resort by 3 seconds.
